name: Bandage Up
description: Heal 4 HP. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Heal 6 HP. Exhaust.

name: Blind
description: Apply 2 Weak.
upgraded_description: Apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.

name: Dark Shackles
description: Enemy loses 9 Strength for the rest of this turn. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Enemy loses 15 Strength for the rest of this turn. Exhaust.

name: Deep Breath
description: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. Draw 1 card.
upgraded_description: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. Draw 2 cards.

name: Discovery
description: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Choose 1 of 3 random cards to add to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

name: Dramatic Entrance
description: Innate. Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Innate. Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

name: Enlightenment
description: Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 1 this turn.
upgraded_description: Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand to 1 for the rest of combat.

name: Finesse
description: Gain 2 Block. Draw 1 card.
upgraded_description: Gain 4 Block. Draw 1 card.

name: Flash of Steel
description: Deal 3 damage. Draw 1 card.
upgraded_description: Deal 6 damage. Draw 1 card.

name: Forethought
description: Put a card from your hand to the bottom of your draw pile. It costs 0 until played.
upgraded_description: Put any number of cards from your hand to the bottom of your draw pile. They cost 0 until played.

name: Good Instincts
description: Gain 6 Block.
upgraded_description: Gain 9 Block.

name: Impatience
description: If you have no Attacks in your hand, draw 2 cards.
upgraded_description: If you have no Attacks in your hand, draw 3 cards.

name: Jack of All Trades
description: Add a random Colorless card to your hand. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Add 2 random Colorless cards to your hand. Exhaust.

name: Madness
description: A random card in your hand costs 0 for the rest of combat. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: A random card in your hand costs 0 for the rest of combat. Exhaust.

name: Mind Blast
description: Innate. Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.
upgraded_description: Innate. Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.

name: Panacea
description: Gain 1 Artifact. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Gain 2 Artifact. Exhaust.

name: Panache
description: Every time you play 5 cards in a single turn, deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
upgraded_description: Every time you play 5 cards in a single turn, deal 14 damage to ALL enemies.

name: Purity
description: Choose and Exhaust up to 3 cards in your hand. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Choose and Exhaust up to 5 cards in your hand. Exhaust.

name: Swift Strike
description: Deal 7 damage.
upgraded_description: Deal 10 damage.

name: Trip
description: Apply 2 Vulnerable.
upgraded_description: Apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

name: Apotheosis
description: Upgrade ALL cards in your deck for the rest of combat. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Upgrade ALL cards in your deck for the rest of combat. Exhaust.

name: Chrysalis
description: Shuffle 3 random Skills into your draw pile. They cost 0. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Shuffle 5 random Skills into your draw pile. They cost 0. Exhaust.

name: Hand of Greed
description: Deal 20 damage. If this kills the enemy, gain 20 Gold.
upgraded_description: Deal 25 damage. If this kills the enemy, gain 25 Gold.

name: Magnetism
description: At the start of each turn, add a random Colorless card to your hand.
upgraded_description: At the start of each turn, add a random Colorless card to your hand.

name: Master of Strategy
description: Draw 3 cards. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Draw 4 cards. Exhaust.

name: Mayhem
description: At the start of your turn, play the top card of your draw pile.
upgraded_description: At the start of your turn, play the top card of your draw pile.

name: Metamorphosis
description: Shuffle 3 random Attacks into your draw pile. They cost 0. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Shuffle 5 random Attacks into your draw pile. They cost 0. Exhaust.

name: Sadistic Nature
description: Whenever you apply a debuff, deal 5 damage to that enemy.
upgraded_description: Whenever you apply a debuff, deal 7 damage to that enemy.

name: Secret Technique
description: Choose a Skill from your draw pile and put it into your hand. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Choose a Skill from your draw pile and put it into your hand.

name: Secret Weapon
description: Choose an Attack from your draw pile and put it into your hand. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Choose an Attack from your draw pile and put it into your hand.

name: The Bomb
description: At the end of 3 turns, deal 40 damage to ALL enemies.
upgraded_description: At the end of 3 turns, deal 50 damage to ALL enemies.

name: Thinking Ahead
description: Draw 2 cards. Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Draw 3 cards. Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.

name: Transmutation
description: Add X random Colorless cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Add X+1 random Colorless cards to your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.

name: Violence
description: Put 3 random Attacks from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Put 4 random Attacks from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.

name: Bite
description: Deal 7 damage. Heal 2 HP.
upgraded_description: Deal 8 damage. Heal 3 HP.

name: Ritual Dagger
description: Deal 15 damage. If this kills the enemy, permanently increase this card's damage by 3. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Deal 15 damage. If this kills the enemy, permanently increase this card's damage by 5. Exhaust.

name: J.A.X.
description: Lose 3 HP. Gain 2 Strength.
upgraded_description: Lose 3 HP. Gain 3 Strength.

name: Apparition
description: Ethereal. Gain 1 Intangible. Exhaust.
upgraded_description: Gain 1 Intangible. Exhaust.
